tool_description: Get similar words in multiple languages. Largest web database @ 35 million synonyms in 26 languages.
title: Thesaurus - Multi Language Synonyms

api_list.name: Retrieve Synonym
api_list.description:
Send a language, locale and word to get a full list of synonyms for that word.

**POST request:**
/synonym

**Example body data in JSON:**
{
  "word": "table",
  "language": "EN",
  "locale": "US"
}

**Languages and Locales:**
AR/EG: Arabic(Egypt)
BG/BG: Bulgarian
CA/ES: Catalan
CS/CZ: Czech
DA/DK: Danish
DE/CH: German(Swiss)
DE/DE: German(Germany)
EL/GR: Greek
EN/US: English(US)
ES/ES: Spanish
FR/FR: French
GA/IE: Gaelic(Ireland)
HU/HU: Hungarian
IT/IT: Italian
LB/LU: Luxembourgish
NB/NO: Norwegian
NE/NP: Nepali
NL/NL: Dutch
PL/PL: Polish
PT/PT: Portuguese
RO/RO: Romanian
RU/RU: Russian
SK/SK: Slovak
SL/SL: Slovenian
SV/SE: Swedish
UK/UA: Ukranian

api_list.name: Available Languages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://thesaurus-multi-language-synonyms.p.rapidapi.com/availablelanguages"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "thesaurus-multi-language-synonyms.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Heartbeat
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://thesaurus-multi-language-synonyms.p.rapidapi.com/heartbeat"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "thesaurus-multi-language-synonyms.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
